cs310w10.MoleFinder.Controller
Class MoleController

java.lang.Object
  cs310w10.MoleFinder.Controller.MoleController

public class MoleController
extends java.lang.Object

MoleController serves as an interface between the model and view components. It's role is to create and manage Mole objects, while keeping their state tracked in the database.

Author:
Bing
